```{r}
crash<-subset(insurance, insurance$TARGET_FLAG=="1")
table(crash$JOB)
plot(table(crash$JOB))
table(crash$AGE)
hist(table(crash$AGE),xlim = c(15,80), ylim = c(0,20), breaks = 10)
table(crash$SEX)
plot(table(crash$SEX))
table(crash$CAR_TYPE)
plot(table(crash$CAR_TYPE))
table(crash$URBANICITY)
plot(table(crash$URBANICITY))
table(crash$REVOKED)
plot(table(crash$REVOKED))


nocrash<-subset(insurance, insurance$TARGET_FLAG=="0")
table(nocrash$JOB)
plot(table(nocrash$JOB))
table(nocrash$AGE)
hist(table(nocrash$AGE),xlim = c(15,80), ylim = c(0,20), breaks = 10)
table(nocrash$SEX)
plot(table(nocrash$SEX))
table(nocrash$CAR_TYPE)
plot(table(nocrash$CAR_TYPE))
table(nocrash$URBANICITY)
plot(table(nocrash$URBANICITY))
table(nocrash$REVOKED)
plot(table(nocrash$REVOKED))
```
